message: I'm excited to offer you this valuable product for $18,000. It's a great opportunity to own a unique item that I'm confident you'll love.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $18,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000, but I'm not going any lower than that. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $13,000 for the product.  This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $15,000, Bob. I've already made concessions, and I need to make a profit. If you're not willing to meet me at $15,000, I'll have to explore other options.
